mapper.insert:
insert into cy_customer ( id_customer, customer_name, party_no, customer_sex, card_id, phone_no, provinces, city, regional, zip_code, date_birth, customer_age, residential_address, residential_tel, company_address, company_tel, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) values
( (select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id), #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.partyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.provinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.regional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.customerAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.residentialAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.residentialTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'system',now(),'system',now() )

insert into cy_case ( id_case, case_serial_number, collection_status, fixed_quota, overdue_amount, overdue_days, late_stage, collection_phase, remaining_principal, overdue_interest, late_charge, cancel_date, statement_date, due_date, latest_payment_date, latest_payment_amount, card_start_date, card_stop_date, collection_date, concordance_x_day, concordance_30_day, concordance_60_day, case_identify_1, case_identify_2,case_identify_3,remark, emp_no, customer_id, batch_code, product_name, total_owed, overdue_record, whether_installment, penal_sum, funding_party, regulation_code, minimum_payment, appoint_case_amount, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) values
( (select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id), #{item.caseSerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.collectionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fixedQuota,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.overdueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.overdueDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.lateStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.collectionPhase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.remainingPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.overdueInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.lateCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.cancelDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.statementDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.dueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.latestPaymentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.latestPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.cardStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.cardStopDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.collectionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.concordanceXDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.concordance30Day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.concordance60Day,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.caseIdentify1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.caseIdentify2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.caseIdentify3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.batchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.totalOwed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.overdueRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.whetherInstallment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.penalSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.fundingParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.regulationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.minimumPayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.appointCaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'system',now(),'system',now() )

insert into cy_meituan_case ( id_meituan_case, collection_of, follow_up_people, follow_up_people_code, divisional_date, cancel_date, caseIdentify_1, product, case_serial_number, customer_name, card_id, phone_no, contact_name, contact_phone_no, due_date, the_amount_overdue_IOU, number_overdue_IOU, time_past_due_on_IOU, late_stage, overdue_days, overdue_amount, within_time_limit_principal, overdue_interest, late_charge, late_dee, settlement_advance, remaining_principal, in_the_rush_amount, low_telephone_unverified, medium_telephone_unverified, high1_telephone_unverified, low_address_unverified, medium_address_unverified, high1_address_unverified, poi_stores_list, high2_telephone_unverified, high2_address_unverified, urged_authorization, resident_provinces, InterestFree_amount, caseIdentify_2, caseIdentify_3, created_by,created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) values
( (select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id), #{item.collectionOf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.followUpPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.followUpPeopleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.divisionalDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.cancelDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.caseIdentify1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.product,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.caseSerialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contactPhoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.dueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.theAmountOverdueIOU,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.numberOverdueIOU,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.timePastDueOnIOU,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.lateStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.overdueDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.overdueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.withinTimeLimitPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.overdueInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.lateCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.lateDee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.settlementAdvance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.appointCaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.inTheRushAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.lowTelephoneUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mediumTelephoneUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.high1TelephoneUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.lowAddressUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediumAddressUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.high1AddressUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.poiStoresList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.high2TelephoneUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.high2AddressUnverified,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.urgedAuthorization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.residentProvinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.interestFreeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.caseIdentify2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.caseIdentify3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'system',now(),'system',now() )
